name: Knotable, Inc.
description: Developer of a note-taking application intended to help businesses to streamline their work in an organized way. The company's application combines smooth note-taking features, a visual organization system and unlimited file storage to offer email, sticky notes and a file cabinet in one package, enabling users to eliminate the daily stand-up meetings and make things smooth and efficient.
one_liner: Developer of a note-taking application intended to help businesses to streamline their work in an organized way. The company's application combines smooth note-taking features, a visual organization system and unlimited file storage to offer email, sticky notes and a file cabinet in one package, enabling users to eliminate the daily stand-up meetings and make things smooth and efficient.
